mapper.select: select case isnull(d1.dict_code) when 1 then 'no' else d1.dict_code end dictCode, count(1) pcount from sop_project p left join sop_meeting_record r on p.id=r.project_id left join dict d1 on r.meeting_result=d1.dict_code where p.id=#{projectId} and r.meeting_type=#{meetingType} group by d1.dict_code;
